function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate protective equipment and cleaning tools for janitors","Impact":"Increased risk of janitors interacting with sterilized surfaces and waste, potentially leading to disease transmission","Mitigation":"Provide janitors with adequate protective equipment and cleaning tools, and centralize sanitization tasks to reduce workloads","Technologies":"Centralized monitoring system for sanitizers","People":"Janitors, administrative staff","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Lack of coordination in cleaning and operation processes","Impact":"Increased risk of inadequate cleaning and potential disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement a coordinated cleaning schedule and conduct regular health screenings for staff","Technologies":"Communication tools for staff coordination","People":"Administrative staff, trainers, janitors","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Inadequate post-pandemic measures for facility prevention and preparedness","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation in the built environment","Mitigation":"Implement recommendations for HVAC, lighting systems, safety and security, maintenance and cleaning management, and spatial configurations","Technologies":"HVAC systems, advanced lighting systems, security monitoring systems","People":"Facility management, researchers","Owner":"Facility management"}]}
